abstract: Sarah McCarry reviews books The Darkest Part of the Forest by Holly Black and The Ghosts of Heaven by Marcus Sedgwick.
lead_paragraph: Humans and fairies, cave men and astronauts: Two fantasy books for young adults move across boundaries.
